authors: L. Raveen S. De Silva
comment: This study focuses on the design of LISN model to reduce output noise from traditional SMPSs used with non-ideal components. A traditional DC/DC buck SMPS was employed, and filters were designed using LISN to suppress SMPS noise. Simulation results demonstrate that the designed filter significantly reduced SMPS output noise when compared to initial and final observations
